PHASE SUMMARY — Thalcave — early

Role: 
Thalcauve is a native Patagonian who is encountered by the group. He is described as a "giant" and is able to communicate with Jacques Paganel in his native language.

Traits: 
- Physically large (referred to as a "giant")
- Speaks his native language well

Relationships: 
- Interacts with Jacques Paganel, exchanging a few words with him
- Is being followed by the group, who are trying to keep up with him

Notable behaviors: 
- Is able to communicate with Paganel, who is able to learn a few words from him
- Is described as being able to speak well in his native language
